text: (nabiyē! ovunṭa) “dharmaya himi ayavaḷuni! oba tavrātayada injīlayada obagē deviyangē sannidhānayen obaṭa pahaḷa karana lada (anit) dharmayanda (ættenma) oba nokaḍavā iṭu kara anugamanaya karana turu oba kisivakaṭat ayat keneku nova” yayi oba kiyanu. obagē deviyangen obaṭa pahaḷa karana lada mema dharmaya ovungen væḍi denekuṭa aparādhayada, pratikṣēpayada niyata vaśayenma væḍi kara tabanu æta. ebævin mema pratikṣēpa karana janatāva venuven oba duk novanu (mænava)
